That's insane!\""},{"lineNumber":210646,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、あれ……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wait, huh...?\""},{"lineNumber":210647,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし扉はまったくの無傷だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, the door was completely unscathed."},{"lineNumber":210648,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ、これは大したものだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh heh, this is something formidable."},{"lineNumber":210649,"originalJapaneseLine":"　破壊するのは無理だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Breaking it is impossible.\""},{"lineNumber":210650,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれだけの攻撃でも駄目なのか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even with an attack like that, it didn't work..."},{"lineNumber":210651,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぱねえ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's crazy...\""},{"lineNumber":210652,"originalJapaneseLine":"「＜エール＞ちゃん、なんかいい手ない？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"<Yell>-chan, do you have any good ideas?\""},{"lineNumber":210653,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"......\""},{"lineNumber":210654,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは渾身の力を込めて、","translatedEnglishLine":"You put all your strength into pushing"},{"lineNumber":210655,"originalJapaneseLine":"巨大な門を押してみた。","translatedEnglishLine":"against the gigantic gate."},{"lineNumber":210656,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおー！　水臭いぜ、＜エール＞ちゃん！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa! Don't be so stingy, <Yell>-chan!"},{"lineNumber":210657,"originalJapaneseLine":"　相棒がやるなら俺だってー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"If my partner is doing it, so will I!\""},{"lineNumber":210658,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"......\""},{"lineNumber":210659,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とー！　ぬおー！　ふぬぬぬ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah! Nuooh! Funununu!\""},{"lineNumber":210660,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなた達は二人揃って五分ほど挑戦してみたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"The two of you tried together for about five minutes,"},{"lineNumber":210661,"originalJapaneseLine":"門は微動だにしなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"but the gate did not move at all."},{"lineNumber":210662,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……無理だこれ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah... this is impossible...\""},{"lineNumber":210663,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、無理でしょ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, it’s impossible, right...?\""},{"lineNumber":210664,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"......\""},{"lineNumber":210665,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すみません、こっちは寿司屋でーす！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Excuse me, this is a sushi restaurant!\""},{"lineNumber":210666,"originalJapaneseLine":"長田君もノってくれた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nagata-kun also joined in."},{"lineNumber":210667,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しーん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Silence...\""},{"lineNumber":210668,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほらー、やっぱ無理じゃーん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"See, I told you it's impossible.\""},{"lineNumber":210669,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうやら魔王達は宅配は頼まないらしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Apparently, the Demon Lords don’t order delivery."},{"lineNumber":210670,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぱねえ！　＜エール＞ちゃん、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Crazy! <Yell>-chan,"},{"lineNumber":210671,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんなこと出来たのかよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"you could do something like that!?\""},{"lineNumber":210672,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"......\""},{"lineNumber":210673,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは鍵開けの技術なんて","translatedEnglishLine":"You remembered that you don't have any lockpicking skills."},{"lineNumber":210674,"originalJapaneseLine":"持っていないことを思い出した。","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":210675,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃあなんで言ったの！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then why did you say that!?\""},{"lineNumber":210676,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、しかし鍵穴を探すというのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, however, looking for a keyhole"},{"lineNumber":210677,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いい線いっている」","translatedEnglishLine":"is a good idea.\""},{"lineNumber":210678,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":210679,"originalJapaneseLine":"「門である以上、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Since this is a gate,"},{"lineNumber":210680,"originalJapaneseLine":"　開く方法は用意されている筈だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"there should be some way to open it.\""},{"lineNumber":210681,"originalJapaneseLine":"「開く方法？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A way to open it?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何メートルあるか分からないほどに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was so huge that I couldn't tell how many meters tall it was,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大なものだった。
あなたは一番上まで見上げてみたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You tried looking all the way to the top,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次第に首が痛くなってきたので、すぐに諦めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but your neck gradually started hurting, so you gave up quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいてっ」
隣では見上げすぎたのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next to you, perhaps from looking up too much,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田君が後ろ向きに転んでいた。
「てゆーか！　なんだよこれ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I mean, what the heck is this!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなのあったら先進めなくね！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With something like this here, we can't move forward, right!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うは！　こりゃすごいだすなぁ！」
「はて……こんなものあったかな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... was there something like this before...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここは昨日も通った道……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is the path we also took yesterday...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たった一夜でこんなものを……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How could something like this appear overnight...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん、うーん！
よっこいしょーだすー！」
「っ、はあ、はあ……
駄目だす、開きそうにないだす……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No good, it doesn't look like it will open..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「雨垂れ石を穿つ、とも言う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say even a dripping water pierces stone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まずはやるだけやってみるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's at least try to do whatever we can first.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズの抜き放った剣の一撃。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A strike from Arms' drawn sword.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 斬られた部分に爆発が発生し、門が揺れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An explosion occurred where it was cut, and the gate shook.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおーーっ！　パネーーー！」
「って、あれ……？」
しかし扉はまったくの無傷だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the door was completely unscathed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、これは大したものだ。
破壊するのは無理だな」
「あれだけの攻撃でも駄目なのか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even with an attack like that, it didn't work...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぱねえ……」
「＜エール＞ちゃん、なんかいい手ない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "<Yell>-chan, do you have any good ideas?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは渾身の力を込めて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You put all your strength into pushing

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大な門を押してみた。
「うおー！　水臭いぜ、＜エール＞ちゃん！
相棒がやるなら俺だってー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If my partner is doing it, so will I!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とー！　ぬおー！　ふぬぬぬ！」
あなた達は二人揃って五分ほど挑戦してみたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two of you tried together for about five minutes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 門は微動だにしなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the gate did not move at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……無理だこれ……」
「いや、無理でしょ……」
「すみません、こっちは寿司屋でーす！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Excuse me, this is a sushi restaurant!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田君もノってくれた。
「しーん……」
「ほらー、やっぱ無理じゃーん」
どうやら魔王達は宅配は頼まないらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, the Demon Lords don’t order delivery.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぱねえ！　＜エール＞ちゃん、
そんなこと出来たのかよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you could do something like that!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは鍵開けの技術なんて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You remembered that you don't have any lockpicking skills.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 持っていないことを思い出した。
「じゃあなんで言ったの！？」
「いや、しかし鍵穴を探すというのは、
いい線いっている」
「門である以上、
開く方法は用意されている筈だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there should be some way to open it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「開く方法？」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
